id:
From X-Men to Deadpool: Stan Lee's Marvel movie cameos – in pictures
From X-Men to Deadpool: Stan Lee's Marvel movie cameos – in pictures
paragraph:
The chairman and face of Marvel Comics’ first cameo was in a Hulk TV movie in 1989. Since 2000 the Stan Lee cameo has become a feature of each filmGuardian staff

Mon 12 Nov 2018 21.56 GMT


Last modified on Tue 13 Nov 2018 15.54 GMT

Photograph: Marvel
